Package org.thewhitemage13.service

Class PostStatisticServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.thewhitemage13.service.PostStatisticServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PostStatisticServiceInterface
@Service @Transactional public class PostStatisticServiceImpl extends Object implements PostStatisticServiceInterface
Service implementation for managing PostStatistic entities.

This service provides methods for creating, deleting, and retrieving statistics related to posts. It interacts with the PostStatisticRepository to perform CRUD operations on post statistics.

Key Features:

  • Tracks the creation and deletion of posts.
  • Retrieves post statistics for all dates or a specific date.
  • Deletes statistics for a specific date.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

      Specified by:

    • getStatisticByDate

      public PostStatistic getStatisticByDate(LocalDate date)
      Retrieves the post statistic for a specific date.

      If no statistic exists for the given date, a StatisticNotFoundException is thrown.

      Specified by:
      getStatisticByDate in interface PostStatisticServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      date - the date for which to retrieve the post statistic
      Returns:
      the PostStatistic for the specified date
      Throws:
      StatisticNotFoundException - if no statistic is found for the given date

    • deleteStatisticByDate

      public void deleteStatisticByDate(LocalDate date)
      Deletes the post statistic for a specific date.

      This method will remove the post statistic entry from the repository for the given date.

      Specified by:
      deleteStatisticByDate in interface PostStatisticServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      date - the date for which to delete the post statistic
      Throws:
      StatisticNotFoundException - if no statistic is found for the given date

    • createPostStatistic

      public void createPostStatistic(org.thewhitemage13.PostEvent postEvent)
      Creates or updates post statistics when a post is created.

      If no statistic exists for the current date, a new statistic is created with the number of created posts set to 1. If a statistic already exists for the date, the number of created posts is incremented.

      Specified by:
      createPostStatistic in interface PostStatisticServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      postEvent - the event containing the post information

    • deletePostStatistic

      public void deletePostStatistic(org.thewhitemage13.PostEvent postEvent)
      Deletes or updates post statistics when a post is deleted.

      If no statistic exists for the current date, a new statistic is created with the number of deleted posts set to 1. If a statistic already exists for the date, the number of deleted posts is incremented, and the number of created posts is decremented.

      Specified by:
      deletePostStatistic in interface PostStatisticServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      postEvent - the event containing the post information
